      • Serialized Fields

        • boardView

          javax.swing.JComponent[][] boardView
          boardView:

          The board view is modelized as a two-dimension array, boardView, containing the board's squares views,
          following the same pattern as the board model.

        • colorScheme

          ColorScheme colorScheme
          Holds the color scheme for board and pieces display. ColorScheme

        • boardSize

          java.awt.Dimension boardSize
          The dimension of the board: number of columns and rows
